description: Detects SharpLdapWhoami, a whoami alternative by asking the LDAP service on a domain controller
false_positives: Programs that use the same command line flags
name: SharpLdapWhoami
query: (process.executable.text:*\\SharpLdapWhoami.exe OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:*SharpLdapWhoami* OR Product:"SharpLdapWhoami" OR process.command_line.text:(*\ \/method\:ntlm OR *\ \/method\:kerb OR *\ \/method\:nego OR *\ \/m\:nego OR *\ \/m\:ntlm OR *\ \/m\:kerb))
author: Florian Roth
